channel.title: shortcodes on A Devops Engineering Blog
channel.description: Recent content in shortcodes on A Devops Engineering Blog

item.title: Testpost1
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, My name is Jobin Jose. I am currently working as a Devops engineer based out of Oslo, Norway; particularly focused on areas around Azure, Devops, IaC, Automation and Security. The statements I have posted on this site are mine alone and do not necessarily reflect the views of any organization. Should there be questions or concerns about the contents, feel free to reachout @ jobinjosem@hotmail.com
